attributes.action: AWARD EXTRA INCOME TO FATHERS RECIEVING BENEFIT !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was recently told by my local job centre that because I had my children for the week during half term I should not of recieved any benefit because I was not available for work ! I found this out when I enquired for extra income to feed my children during the week, as the law states the minimum amounts that family's need to live on, come on Mr blair wats it all about?
